SimulationConfiguration

Class ResourcesConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • SimulationConfiguration.ResourcesConfiguration

  • public class ResourcesConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the configuration parameters of the resources of a simulation.

    • Constructor Summary

      ResourcesConfiguration(ResourcesConfiguration original)
